title: Feather
description: Feather © is a flying hoverboard that allows you to (truly) hover around a place at a limited height and speed. But how does it do that? With nitrogen! With a powerful combination of electricity and nitrogen, it boosts you from the ground! Feather is currently distributed in 3 versions: Tailwind, Racefox and Fairytale.

title: Holograms
description: The MIB Holograms © are holographic displays that come out of a Hologram table and are displayed in custom physical lights.
